General.Name: Suzhou Keda Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Keda Technology Co., Ltd provides video surveillance and conference products, and video application solutions to public and corporate customers in China. The company's video surveillance products include intelligent cameras, human recognition systems, and face recognition systems; commercial, professional, border collie, and TU series network video recorders; network cameras comprising box, IR bullet, semi dome, fisheye and pinhole, speed dome, explosion proof, PTZ, and TU series cameras; software and embedded video management systems; and vehicle and portable mobile surveillance solutions. Its video surveillance products also consist of encoders and decoders; gateways and streaming media servers; network storage products, such as IP SANs and private cloud storage systems; and LED and LCD displays, and splicing processors. The company's video conference products include multipoint control units, multimedia servers, and TV wall servers; software and rackmount terminals; and peripheral devices, which include cameras, microphones, and wireless presentation senders. In addition, it offers video application solutions, including emergency dispatch system, remote compliant reception, remote prison visit, distance learning, surgical operation demo system, digital court, and remote video interrogation solutions. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
